intro: Biophytum santanderense, commonly known as the Santander spider plant, is a flowering plant native to Colombia. It belongs to the family Phyllanthaceae and is characterized by its rosette-shaped leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. The plant is adapted to grow in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in well-drained environments. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and low maintenance requirements. Biophytum santanderense is also valued for its ability to tolerate drought conditions.
